org.springframework.data.redis.connection

类 RedisPassword

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.redis.connection.RedisPassword

  • public class RedisPassword
extends Object
    Value object which may or may not contain a Redis password.

    If a password is present, isPresent() will return true and get() will return the value.

    The password is stored as character array.

    从以下版本开始:
    2.0

      • of

        public static RedisPassword of(@Nullable
                               String passwordAsString)
        Create a RedisPassword from a String.
        参数:
        passwordAsString - the password as string.
        返回:
        the RedisPassword for passwordAsString.

      • of

        public static RedisPassword of(@Nullable
                               char[] passwordAsChars)
        Create a RedisPassword from a char array.
        参数:
        passwordAsChars - the password as char array.
        返回:
        the RedisPassword for passwordAsChars.

      • none

        public static RedisPassword none()
        Create an absent RedisPassword.
        返回:
        the absent RedisPassword.

      • isPresent

        public boolean isPresent()
        Return true if there is a password present, otherwise false.
        返回:
        true if there is a password present, otherwise false

      • get

        public char[] get()
           throws NoSuchElementException
        Return the password value if present. Throws NoSuchElementException if the password is absent.
        返回:
        the password.
        抛出:
        NoSuchElementException - if the password is absent.

      • map

        public <R> Optional<R> map(Function<char[],R> mapper)
        Map the password using a Function and return a Optional containing the mapped value.

        Absent passwords return a Optional.empty().

        参数:
        mapper - must not be null.
        返回:
        the mapped result.

      • toOptional

        public Optional<char[]> toOptional()
        Adopt the password to Optional containing the password value.

        Absent passwords return a Optional.empty().

        返回:
        the Optional containing the password value.

        public String toString()

        toString 在类中 Object
